parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Environment

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the current wind strength.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''windStr'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>10 [[setWindStr]] (0.5 * [[windStr]]);</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setWindStr]], [[gusts]], [[setGusts]], [[setWind]], [[setWindDir]], [[setWindForce]], [[wind]], [[windDir]]
</value></part></template>

[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
